featured.text: She had to be hospitalized for three weeks whenever she had a cold.
Even when tests came back negative, more were ordered, and she was hospitalized as a precaution when she developed a cold.

definition.zh_def: 住院，指因病或受傷而被送入醫院接受治療。
definition.en_def: To admit someone to a hospital for medical treatment.
definition.example: The doctor decided to hospitalize the patient for further observation.
